bill_title: Celebrating the Elk Point-Jefferson Huskies Football Team.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Celebrating the Elk Point-Jefferson Huskies Football Team. WHEREAS, on November 11, 2022, the Elk Point-Jefferson Huskies made their first appearance in a state championship football game in Division 11B, won the game, and earned their first state football championship with a final score of 21-14; and WHEREAS, the football team was expertly led by their coach Jake Terry and assistant coaches Jake Otkin, Manny Scarmon, Mason Temme, Adam Timmins, and Heath Van Roekel, and the cheer team was lead by Maria Love: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature recognizes the many successes and the state championship victory of the Elk-Point Jefferson Huskies Football Team during their 2022 season.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Celebrating the Elk Point-Jefferson Huskies Football Team. WHEREAS, on November 11, 2022, the Elk Point-Jefferson Huskies made their first appearance in a state championship football game in Division 11B, won the game, and earned their first state football championship with a final score of 21-14; and WHEREAS, the football team was expertly led by their coach Jake Terry and assistant coaches Jake Otkin, Manny Scarmon, Mason Temme, Adam Timmins, and Heath Van Roekel, and the cheer team was lead by Maria Love: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature recognizes the many successes and the state championship victory of the Elk-Point Jefferson Huskies Football Team during their 2022 season.
